overview: Mr. Barry is responsible for all aspects of business development for PC Helps, with a focus on strategic partner development and channel strategies. Prior to PC Helps, Mr. Barry was a partner with OpenView Venture Partners, an expansion stage venture capital firm. Before OpenView, he spent 15 years with Microsoft, where he held key leadership roles in consulting services, desktop application support, direct and channel sales, and strategic and emerging business development. Earlier in his career, he held senior-level positions in enterprise sales and marketing at Wang Laboratories and co-founded CAS, Inc., a startup focused on small business applications. Mr. Barry graduated from West Virginia University with a BS in business administration and has studied graduate business management at Southern Methodist University.
